deity.name: Gruumsh
deity.title: The One-Eyed God
deity.text: Gruumsh is the chaotic evil god of destruction, lord of marauding barbarian hordes. Where Bane commands conquest, Gruumsh exhorts his followers to slaughter and pillage. Orcs are his fervent followers, and they bear a particular hatred for elves and eladrin because Corellon put out one of Gruumsh's eyes. The One-Eyed God gives simple orders to his followers:
► Let your strength crush the weak.
► Do as you you will, and let no one stop you.

power.title: Gruumsh's Battle Fury
power.fluff: An ally's violent success earns Gruumsh's reward, and you channel divine power to inspire the ally to greater acts of violence

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 3 squares of you drops a creature to 0 hit points or fewer

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can charge or make a basic attack as a free reaction. The target grants combat advantage until the end of his or her next turn.
